title: Doonk Master - Darius Fun And Stuff

embed.description: uhm yea Song - Goblin From Mars - Infantry https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ieMkQADq1Rs

body: so uh yeah, honestly my first time posting here so go easy one me senapais ( yes ik its wrong but i spell it that way chill ) its one of the three videos which i actually tried using creator suite on, so check it out and comment suggestions or watever, hell even just say "Cringe - Fest 2016" if u enjoyed it <3  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
You could of probably spent a little bit more time making the camera angles/movement a bit smoother, also if the song your using doesn't fit the entire video don't just replay it again find a song that fits the length of the video and edit around that, I understand your probably very new to this but don't worry so am I and I learned a couple of very cool tricks. Check out one of my videos here where I used creator suit, it apparently did very well and got a bit of attention

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7fWTwREJBnE&t=85s
thanks for the advice, but i dont get u, the song isnt replayed, its just like that and as for the angles / movement, i understand wat your going on about, i did it with the default not fps, whoops
1:36 isn't that just the same song again?

the song is goblins from mars - infantry, GFM has the tendacy to have a song play for 1 and a half min, then make it go super quite, then start again, but with a sound sligtly similar to the begining except erm not, i could use that for something but idk how
also screw english spelling
